msItem.title: Lettere di diversi principi et huomini illustri in varii negotii spettanti al secolo 1500

supportDesc.extent: 52 leaves : 278 x 200 (200 x 120) mm. bound to 288 x 210 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, 52; 74-124, contemporary foliation in ink, bottom center; , 1-52, modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a cursive script by a single hand.
